title: Best of The Herd: 12/27/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/27/2019
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin Cowherd saying we can finally lay to rest the most talked about team in the NFL this year, the Dallas Cowboys after this weekends game against the Washington Redskins. If Dak Prescott isn't the man to blame for the recent shortcomings with the Cowboys this season then he also doesn't deserve any praise for previous successful ones. College Football playoffs begin this weekend but keep in mind the only reason LSU & Ohio State fought for the number one seed was to avoid Clemson as long as possible.


Guest: Matt Leinart

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin Cowherd saying we can finally lay to rest the most talked about team in the NFL this year, the Dallas Cowboys after this weekends game against the Washington Redskins. If Dak Prescott isn't the man to blame for the recent shortcomings with the Cowboys this season then he also doesn't deserve any praise for previous successful ones. College Football playoffs begin this weekend but keep in mind the only reason LSU & Ohio State fought for the number one seed was to avoid Clemson as long as possible.


Guest: Matt Leinart
